name: 王凡
objective:
本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句及多種類型的段落。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.
schedule:
Week 1	Course Introduction
Week 2	Time and Tense
Week 3	Auxiliary Verbs
Week 4	Verbs
Week 5	Nouns
Week 6	Pronouns
Week 7	Adjectives and Adverbs
Week 8	Comparison
Week 9	Conjunctions and Conjunctive Adverbs
Week 10	Mid-term exam
Week 11	Prepositions
Week 12	Sentence formation
Week 13	Passive
Week 14	Noun and adjective clauses
Week 15	Adverb clauses
Week 16	Final presentation
Week 17	Final presentation
Week 18	Final exam
